    • 方法详细资料

      • getTransaction

        public static Transaction getTransaction(java.lang.String txId,
                                         boolean isRaw,
                                         Revision revision)
                                  throws ClientIOException
        Get transaction by transaction Id.
        参数:
        txId - required transaction id .
        isRaw - is response raw transaction.
        revision - Revision revision.
        返回:
        Transaction Transaction
        抛出:
        ClientIOException

      • getTransactionReceipt

        public static Receipt getTransactionReceipt(java.lang.String txId,
                                            Revision revision)
                                     throws ClientIOException
        Get transaction receipt
        参数:
        txId - txId hex string start with "0x"
        revision - Revision
        返回:
        Receipt return Receipt .
        抛出:
        ClientIOException

      • transfer

        public static TransferResult transfer(RawTransaction transaction)
                               throws ClientIOException
        Transfer amount, raw transaction will be encoded by rlp encoder and convert to hex string with prefix "0x". Then the hex string will be packaged into TransferRequest bean object and serialized to JSON string.
        参数:
        transaction - RawTransaction raw transaction to to send
        返回:
        TransferResult
        抛出:
        ClientIOException - network error, 5xx http status means request error, 4xx http status means no enough gas or balance.

      • transfer

        public static TransferResult transfer(java.lang.String rawTransactionHexString)
                               throws ClientIOException
        Send the transaction hex string.
        参数:
        rawTransactionHexString - hex string of raw transaction.
        返回:
        TransferResult
        抛出:
        ClientIOException

      • transfer

        public static TransferResult transfer(byte[] rawTransactionBytes)
                               throws ClientIOException
        Send transaction bytes.
        参数:
        rawTransactionBytes - byte array.
        返回:
        TransferResult
        抛出:
        ClientIOException

      • sign

        public static RawTransaction sign(RawTransaction rawTransaction,
                                  ECKeyPair keyPair)
        Sign the raw transaction.
        参数:
        rawTransaction - RawTransaction
        返回:
        RawTransaction with signature.

      • signThenTransfer

        public static TransferResult signThenTransfer(RawTransaction rawTransaction,
                                              ECKeyPair keyPair)
                                       throws ClientIOException
        Sign and transfer the raw transaction.
        参数:
        rawTransaction - RawTransaction raw transaction without signature data
        keyPair - ECKeyPair the key pair for the private key.
        返回:
        TransferResult
        抛出:
        ClientIOException

      • buildVETToClause

        public static ToClause buildVETToClause(Address toAddress,
                                        Amount amount,
                                        ToData data)
        Build a transaction clause
        参数:
        toAddress - Address destination address.
        amount - Amount amount to transfer.
        data - ToData some comments maybe.
        返回:
        ToClause to clause.

      • buildDeployClause

        public static ToClause buildDeployClause(java.lang.String contractHex)
        Build deploying the contract codes.
        参数:
        contractHex - byte array
        返回:

      • deployContract

        public static TransferResult deployContract(java.lang.String contractHex,
                                            int gas,
                                            byte gasCoef,
                                            int expiration,
                                            ECKeyPair keyPair)
        Deploy a contract to the block chain.
        参数:
        contractHex - the contract hex string with
        gas - the gas
        gasCoef - the gas coefficient
        expiration - the expiration
        keyPair - private keypair
